uvi.description:
KVM: x86: Handle SRCU initialization failure during page track init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.71 by commit deb2949417677649e2413266d7ce8c2ff73952b4. For more details please see the references link.
